EXT_texture_norm16.summary: The EXT_texture_norm16 extension is part of the WebGL API and provides a set of new 16-bit signed normalized and unsigned normalized formats (fixed-point texture, renderbuffer and texture buffer).

remarks.para: WebGL extensions are available using the method. For more information, see also Using Extensions in the WebGL tutorial.

blockquote.para: Note: This extension is only available to {{domxref("WebGL2RenderingContext", "WebGL 2", "", 1)}} contexts.
